column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I gave this location a 3rd chance to make my order correct.   When you order extra Spinach and add Spicy Bean Sprouts
column2: you think you would have that in addition to the Spicy Chicken Wonton Soup you ordered. Well
column3: I guess not.  What they give you is what you get
column4: regardless of any extras you added.  Of course
column7: hoping you get what you order. NOPE...THEY STRUCK OUT.  I would love to support them
column8: but they cant seem to get it right in my case.  Receipt # 60020
